presentation.fsa
Class GraphDrawingView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              presentation.fsa.GraphView
                  presentation.fsa.GraphDrawingView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, FSAGraphSubscriber, WorkspaceSubscriber
public class GraphDrawingView
extends GraphView
implements WorkspaceSubscriber, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

The component in which users view, create and modify a graph representation of an automaton.

Author:
Helen Bretzke, Lenko Grigorov

private DrawingTool[] drawingTools

modelSwitched

public void modelSwitched(WorkspaceMessage message)
Description copied from interface: WorkspaceSubscriber
Notifies this subscriber that a the model type has been switched (the type of active model has changed e.g. from FSA to petri net) in a WorkspacePublisher to which I have subscribed.
